description.ko: 시간의 무게가 쌓인 퇴적층, 대지가 품은 고요한 기억의 단면입니다.
description.en: Sedimentary layers bearing the weight of time, a cross-section of quiet memories held within the earth.

prompt: TERRA-1 theme, earth texture, macro cross-section of ancient sedimentary rock formation, layered strata in warm earthy tones of #8B4513 sienna brown and #D2691E burnt orange, interspersed with #F4A460 sandy beige veins, deep #2F4F4F slate gray bedrock foundation, weathered surface textures showing erosion patterns, fossilized organic matter embedded in layers, dramatic side lighting creating depth and shadow, ultra-detailed mineral crystalline structures, geological time captured in stone, 8k resolution, photorealistic rendering, cinematic composition.
